message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for you.  I'm initially proposing a price of $1,000,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  While $750,000 is a bit too low for me to consider, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle at $875,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $825,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
